name: eqeqan12d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wa(w0, w1), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))

stmt.origin: eqeq12d(c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(w1, wceq(c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w1, wceq(c1, c3))

comment: A useful inference for substituting definitions into an equality. See also ~ eqeqan12dALT . (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 20-Nov-2019.)
